Package com.etiennecollin.tp1.hero

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.tp1.hero.Hero
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hero0, Hero1, Hero2, Hero3, Hero4
public abstract class Hero extends Object
Hero is an abstract class representing a character in a game.
